field.name: submitButton
field.title: ${uiLabelMap.CommonSubmit}
field.tooltip: Please enter From and Thru date in fields above

display.description: ${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilProperties; if(totalOpening != null )if( totalOpening > 0) totalOpening=totalOpening +'Dr'; else totalOpening = (-1)*totalOpening+'Cr'; return totalOpening;}

${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilProperties; if(totalEndingBalance != null )if( totalEndingBalance > 0) totalEndingBalance=totalEndingBalance +'Dr'; else totalEndingBalance = (-1)*totalEndingBalance+'Cr'; return totalEndingBalance;}
${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilProperties; if(totalOpening != null )if( totalOpening > 0) totalOpening=totalOpening +'Dr'; else totalOpening = (-1)*totalOpening+'Cr'; return totalOpening;}

${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilProperties; if(totalEndingBalance != null )if( totalEndingBalance > 0) totalEndingBalance=totalEndingBalance +'Dr'; else totalEndingBalance = (-1)*totalEndingBalance+'Cr'; return totalEndingBalance;}

field.name: submitButton
field.title: ${uiLabelMap.CommonSubmit}
field.tooltip: Please enter From and Thru date in fields above

form.name: FindCashFlowTotals
form.title: Find list of cash flow totals
